text: Camilo Velozo Zuñiga (born 2 February 1996) is a Chilean karateka. In 2018, he won one of the bronze medals in the men's kumite 67 kg event at the 2018 World Karate Championships held in Madrid, Spain. At the 2019 Pan American Games held in Lima, Peru, he won the silver medal in the men's kumite 67 kg event. == Achievements == {| class="wikitable sortable" width=45% style="font- size:90%; text-align:center;" |- !Year !!Competition !!Venue !!Rank!!Event |- |2018 |World Championships |Madrid, Spain |bgcolor="cc9966" | 3rd |Kumite 67 kg |- |2019 |Pan American Games |Lima, Peru |bgcolor="silver" | 2nd |Kumite 67 kg |} == References == Category:Living people Category:1996 births Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Chilean male karateka Category:Pan American Games medalists in karate Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Chile Category:Karateka at the 2019 Pan American Games
title: Camilo Velozo
